About me

Systems and Computing Engineering student at Universidad Nacional de Colombia with interest in Software Engineering

I'm very glad to speak about some of my relevant academic projects and some interesting info regarding development technologies and important computer science concepts. Im profficient in Java and c++ programming languages. I have and intermediate level in Python, Ruby and JavaScript. Im have short experience with HTML and CSS technologies but im going into it as you can see. ;) I'm a very big fan of Metallica and I play bass and guitar inspired by this musical group. I also enjoy dancing salsa, playing billiar pool, and participating in funny karaokes!
